title: Let's see
brief_description: The manufacture of lenses in the optical industry; craftsmen at work; testing of a lense surface; various machines in operation. Mining of sand in the highlands of Scotland. Factory processes; mixing and melting of ingredients to obtain glass, roughing, smoothing and polishing glass; cementing of lenses; use of lenses in filmmaking and in various phases of science and industry.
